title: great now the na board is as fucking ugly as the eu board. also where are my messages?
body:
where does it tell me i got a new message?

and we all know why they did this. so more ppl complain about the boards and riot can go "well now we can delete it"

edit: just realized in case a mod removes your message cause you did something wrong...
you wont even know now. so you wont even knwo you did something wrong.
GOOD FUCKING JOB RIOT!
